posts.title: Web developer intern at GameBag.in
posts.description: With GameBag.in we aim at bringing people back on the sports field releasing them from the chains of the concrete jungle.  We are a set of fun folk and want to encourage new talent. So here we are looking for some. contact details : contact@gamebag.in (7676223977)

posts.meta_job_perks_description:

Work from home upto 2 days a week
Startup environment with great learning experience

posts.description:
We are growing and growing big. And we at foOfys need motivated individuals across multiple platforms to power this growth. Starting today, we will be hiring for the below positions. 
Open for a total of 44 positions distributed across : Beginner,Junior and Senior Levels.

Roles: 

- 4 Project Managers
- 3 Business Analysts
- 2 Designers
- 14 Web Developers
- 10 Mobile App Developers
- 5 Testers
- 3 Quality Analysts 
- 3 Service Designers

Just fill up the form and we shall get in touch with you. - http://goo.gl/4l2zu6

#startupjobs #growth #foOfys #Hiring
#Opening #bangalore #Mobile, #web #Designers #Testing

posts.description:
Hey folks, 
We are an accelerator backed product startup operating out of Hyderabad.
We happened to be looking for someone to join the core team and lead our mobile development division (Android). If you are that person, or know someone who fits the role well, please pass along the reference. 
Here's a longer description: https://hasjob.co/view/1xcv4
Cheers

posts.title: Interior Designer  With Marketing Knowledge
posts.description:
Job Description : 

We are a startup  Looking for Interior Designer with Marketing Knowledge  to Promote our Product to our Clients. 

Responsibilities : 

1. Bring Fresh Ideas which add value to our Product 
2. Help Customers to Understand our product
3. Share  Design Ideas  with customers

Skills Required : 

1. Creative 
2. Creative 
3. Creative 
4. Exposure to Marketing 

Experience : 

1+ Yrs of Experience 


Benefits : 

1. Industry standard Remuneration 
2. Freedom to explore your creativity

posts.title: Photo Editor
posts.description:
Job Description : 

We are a startup  Looking for  Graphics Designer  Who  has  Good Expertise in  Photo Editing,  Digital Album Making.

Responsibilities : 

1.  Photo Editing,  Making Digital Albums
2. Brochure Designing

Skills  Required : 

1. Solid Expertise in  Adobe PhotoShop, Adobe Illustrator, Light Room 
2. Profiling  for various Print Medium ( Paper/Canvas) 
3. Creative  & Very Good  Team Player 



Experience : 

1+ yrs of  Experience 


Benefits : 

1. Industry standard  Remuneration 
2. Freedom to Explore your Creativity

posts.description:
We're looking for young, energetic and talented people to join us at Spry Social Media in Bangalore. Please IM us on Facebook/LinkedIN or email shyam@sprysocial.com
1) Creative Supervisor (Copy): 4-5 years experience in Social Media/Advertising Agencies. Creative with a lateral mind, excellent copy skills and campaign ideation. 
2) Graphic Designer: 2-3 years experience in Social Media/Advertising Agencies in Print and Online. Expert in Adobe Suite including Illustrator, Photoshop & InDesign and should also help in campaign & design ideation.
